definitions.definition: Intensity of feeling; excited interest or eagerness .
examples: They have a great enthusiasm for country music.

definitions.definition: Something in which one is keenly interested.
Possession by a god ; divine inspiration or frenzy .

main_definition: Intensity of feeling; excited interest or eagerness .
secondary_definitions: Something in which one is keenly interested.
( obsolete or historical ) Possession by a god ; divine inspiration or frenzy .
